SEARCH
Package fang2.attributes

Class Box2D

java.lang.Object
fang2.attributes.Box2D
public class Box2D extends Object
Box2D is, effectively, a Rectangle2D for use in fang2. It can convert itself to a Rectangle2D when necessary.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Box2D()
    Default constructor: Create a box at the origin with zero width and height.

    Construct a box with the same corners as the other box.

    Construct a box with the given center and size.
    Box2D(Rectangle2D rectangleToMatch)
    Construct a Box2D with the same corners as the given Rectangle2D

  • Constructor Details

    • Box2D

      public Box2D()
      Default constructor: Create a box at the origin with zero width and height.

    • Box2D

      public Box2D(Box2D other)
      Construct a box with the same corners as the other box.
      Parameters:
      other - the box to match

    • Box2D

      public Box2D(double left, double top, double width, double height)
      The canonical constructor for a Box2D. Takes the coordinates of the upper-left corner and width and height of the box and initializes all of the fields. This is the only routine for Box2D which works with the upper-left corner coordinate.
      Parameters:
      left - x-coordinate of the upper-left corner
      top - y-coordinate of the upper-left corner
      width - width of the box
      height - height of the box

    • Box2D

      public Box2D(Location2D center, Size2D size)
      Construct a box with the given center and size.
      Parameters:
      center - location of the center of the box
      size - the size of the box

    • Box2D

      public Box2D(Rectangle2D rectangleToMatch)
      Construct a Box2D with the same corners as the given Rectangle2D
      Parameters:
      rectangleToMatch - the Rectangle2D to match

  • Method Details

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Point2D point)
      Test whether this Box2D contains the given point or not.
      Parameters:
      point - the point to check
      Returns:
      true if point is on the boundary or in the interior of the Box2D; false otherwise

    • intersects

      public boolean intersects(Location2D location)
      Test whether this Box2D contains the given point or not.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to check
      Returns:
      true if point is on the boundary or in the interior of the Box2D; false otherwise

    • intersects

      public boolean intersects(Sprite sprite)
      Test whether this Box2D intersects with the sprite.
      Parameters:
      sprite - the Sprite to check for intersection
      Returns:
      true if the sprite intersects the edges or interior of this Box2D; false otherwise

    • outcode

      public int outcode(double x, double y)
      Determines where the specified point lies with respect to this Box2D. This method computes a binary OR of the appropriate mask values indicating, for each side of this Box2D, whether or not the specified point is on the same side of the edge as the rest of this Box2D. [ Rectangle2D outcode comment]
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of point to check
      y - y-coordinate of point to check
      Returns:
      the logical OR of the appropriate values
      See Also:
      • OUT_BOTTOM
      • OUT_LEFT
      • OUT_RIGHT
      • OUT_TOP

    • outcode

      public int outcode(Point2D p)
      Determines where the specified Point2D lies with respect to this Box2D. This method computes a binary OR of the appropriate mask values indicating, for each side of this Box2D, whether or not the specified Point2D is on the same side of the edge as the rest of this Box2D. [ Rectangle2D outcode comment]
      Parameters:
      p - the point to check
      Returns:
      the logical OR of the appropriate values
      See Also:
      • OUT_BOTTOM
      • OUT_LEFT
      • OUT_RIGHT
      • OUT_TOP

    • Rectangle2D

      public Rectangle2D Rectangle2D()
      Return a Rectangle2D with corners matching this Box2D.
      Returns:
      a Rectangle2D matching this box

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Return a string representation of the Box2D. This describes the x and y location and the width and height.
      Overrides:
